actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime and Federal Government Surveillance

official_title: To authorize grants to establish and improve criminal forensic laboratories.
short_title: State and Local Criminal Forensic Laboratory Enhancement Act of 2009
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: State and Local Criminal Forensic Laboratory Enhancement Act of 2009 - Directs the Attorney General to: (1) award grants to states, local governments, and Indian tribes to establish new criminal forensic laboratories or expand or improve existing laboratories and to hire and train new forensic laboratory professionals; and (2) give priority in awarding such grants to agencies in jurisdictions with the largest backlogs of criminal forensic examinations.

titles.title: State and Local Criminal Forensic Laboratory Enhancement Act of 2009
State and Local Criminal Forensic Laboratory Enhancement Act of 2009
To authorize grants to establish and improve criminal forensic laboratories.
